alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 08 at 8:56PM CDT until October 09 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Minnesota, North Cass, South Itasca, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Pine Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield, Ashland, Iron, Burnett, Washburn, Sawyer and Price Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation, the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band, the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation, the Red Cliff Band, the St. Croix Band in Burnett County and the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley, Big Sandy Lake, Lena Lake and, East Lake areas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
